lexUnit.name: collusion.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: secret or illegal cooperation in order to cheat or deceive others

sentence.text: The plot of the opera concerns the efforts of Figaro , Susanna and the countess acting in collusion to frustrate the count 's plan .
